name.ja: <ruby>黄<rt>おう</rt></ruby><ruby>金<rt>ごん</rt></ruby><ruby>郷<rt>きょう</rt></ruby>のアンヘルカイド

text.en:
"Eldlich the Golden Lord" + 1 Zombie monster
Must be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by Tributing 1 LIGHT Zombie monster while you have "Eldlich the Golden Lord" in your field or GY. You can only Special Summon "Angelcaido of the Golden Land" once per turn this way. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Eldlich" monster from your Deck, Extra Deck, or GY. You can only use this effect of "Angelcaido of the Golden Land" once per turn.
